alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 2:29AM MST until December 14 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Additional snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches above 6000 feet with 2 to 6 inches below 6000 feet. Wind gusts to 45 MPH across mountain peaks and passes. * WHERE...The Sawtooth, Boulder, and Pioneer Mountains, Stanley Basin, Wood River Valley, Lost River Range, and Beaverhead Lemhi Highlands, including but not limited to Banner Summit, Stanley, Galena Summit, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Hailey, Bellevue, Picabo, Dubois, and Monida Pass. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to falling and blowing snow. Morning and evening commutes may be significantly impacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
